name: Pediatric Mets
title: Pediatric Mets
notes:
**Note 1:** For non-Rhabdomyosarcoma, Pediatric Staging is based on extension (see Pediatric Primary Tumor), regional nodes (see Pediatric Regional Nodes), and mets (collected in this data item).
  
**Note 2:** Use the following resources to determine if involved lymph nodes are distant or if involved organs are metastatic.
* EOD: Review the primary site-based schema
* Summary Stage: Review the primary site-based chapter
rows:
Carcinomatosis

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph node(s)

Distant metastasis, NOS

Unknown; distant metastasis not stated
Not documented in medical record

Death Certificate Only
